entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 1:42PM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Low relative humidity and gusty northerly winds will continue resulting in widespread critical fire weather conditions across much of western and central SD into southern portions of northeastern WY this afternoon into this evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES
